snippet.name: textarea
snippet.starttext: <seform:textarea id="$${id}" label="$${label}" required="$${required:no|yes}" arrange="$${arrange:horizontal:vertical}" rowid="$${rowid}" labelclass="$${labelclass}" labelstyle="$${labelstyle}" fieldclass="$${fieldclass}" fieldstyle="$${fieldstyle}" value="$${value}" cols="$${cols:50}" rows="$${rows:3}" notes="$${notes}" />
